UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cell-selective lysis by novel analogues of melittin against human red blood cells and Escherichia coli.
Literature.Author: Pandey BK, Ahmad A, Asthana N, Azmi S, Srivastava RM, Srivastava S, Verma R, Vishwakarma AL, Ghosh JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=4.2±0.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 10536(MIC=4.1±0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=4.2±0.5µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3.9±0.5µM)
